name: YD Network-wide WPML
author: Yann Dubois

sections.description:
This plugin is an add-on to the WPML Multilingual CMS plugin from http://wpml.org.

It is also an add-on to the WordPress MU Sitewide Tags Pages plugin from Donncha O Coimh (aka. SWT).

It will make it possible to have site-wide contents, search, tags and categories in multiple languages.

Network-wide multilingual support

This WordPress 3.0 multisite or WPMU plugin makes sure that all data replicated to a central aggregation blog by the WordPress MU Sitewide Tags Pages plugin keeps its language properties generated by the WPML Multilingual CMS plugin.

Base package includes .pot file for translation of the interface, and English and French versions.

Installing WPML Network-wide

You will need my other plugin YD Network-wide Options to automatically install and setup WPML on all sub-blogs and replicate settings changes on all blogs.

Beta

This plugin is still in development stage / beta version. But the main features are already working.

Active support

Drop me a line on my WordPress developer site to report bugs, ask for a specific feature or improvement, or just tell me how you’re using the plugin.

Description en Français :

Cette extension pour WordPress 3.0x multi-site ou WordPress MU permet de recopier automatiquement les propriétés linguistiques des articles quand ils sont répliqués dans le blog d’agrégation de l’extension WordPress MU Sitewide Tags depuis tous les blogs de votre réseau WordPress 3.0x ou WPMU.

On obtient ainsi un réseau de sites multilingues, avec possibilité d’avoir des mots-clés (tags), des catégories ou une recherche transversales.

Cette extension est entièrement internationalisée.

La distribution standard inclut le fichier de traduction .pot et les versions française et anglaise.

Le plugin peut fonctionner avec n’importe quelle langue ou jeu de caractères.

Pour toute aide ou information en français, laissez-moi un commentaire sur le site de support du plugin YD Network-wide WPML.

Yann dubois, Développeur WordPress.

Funding Credits

Original development of this plugin has been paid for by Wellcom. Please visit their site!

Le développement d’origine de ce plugin a été financé par Wellcom. Allez visiter leur site !

Translation

If you want to contribute to a translation of this plugin, please drop me a line by e-mail or leave a comment on the plugin’s page.
You will get credit for your translation in the plugin file and this documentation, as well as a link on this page and on my WordPress developers’ blog.

Revisions

  • 0.1.0 Original beta version.
  • 0.1.1 Improved beta version.
  • 0.1.2 Improved beta version.
  • 0.1.3 Improved beta version.

Did you like it?

Drop me a line on http://www.yann.com/en/wp-plugins/yd-network-wide-wpml

And… please rate this plugin –>
sections.installation:
1. Unzip yd-network-wide-wpml.zip
  2. Upload the yd-network-wide-wpml directory and all its contents into the /wp-content/plugins/ directory of your main site
  3. Activate the plugin on your main site or network-wide through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

For specific installations, some more information might be found on the YD Network Wide WPML plugin support page
